text: Hanki Livae naga'pinti mago nagara Gesomu nagakino, tare rankuma'ma zami'nazana, Manase naga'ma amu'nompinti refkoma hu'naza naga'mokizmi mopafinti refko hu'za, kore fre'za zamagu'ma ome nevaziza rankumara Basani mopafi me'nea Golani rankuma'ene, Be-Estarane tava'ozanire'ma me'nea mopa tra'zama nenaza afu zamimo'zama tra'zama nesaza mopanena ana maka Gesomu naga'mokizmia zami'naze.
